text: Alexander Thomas "Alex" Avila (born January 29, 1987) is an American professional baseball player. He plays catcher for the Minnesota Twins. He has also played for the Chicago Cubs, Chicago White Sox, and Detroit Tigers. He is 5' 11" tall and weighs 210 pounds. Avila was born in Hialeah, Florida. ==References== Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Alex Avila
